actions.Name: Slice
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 420.
Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 10

actions.Name: Waxing Slice
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 260.
Combo Action: Slice
Combo Potency: 500
Combo Bonus: Increases Soul Gauge by 10

actions.Name: Infernal Slice
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 280.
Combo Action: Waxing Slice
Combo Potency: 600
Combo Bonus: Increases Soul Gauge by 10

actions.Name: Spinning Scythe
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 10

actions.Name: Nightmare Scythe
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Spinning Scythe
Combo Potency: 200
Combo Bonus: Increases Soul Gauge by 10

actions.Name: Shadow of Death
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.
Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Death's Design, increasing damage you deal target by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends duration of Death's Design by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 10 if target is KO'd before effect expires

actions.Name: Whorl of Death
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Death's Design, increasing damage you deal target by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends duration of Death's Design by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 10 if target is KO'd before effect expires

actions.Name: Soul Slice
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 520.
Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 50
Maximum Charges: 2
Shares a recast timer with Soul Scythe.
Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.

actions.Name: Soul Scythe
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 180 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 50
Maximum Charges: 2
Shares a recast timer with Soul Slice.
Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.

actions.Name: Gibbet
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 500.
560 when executed from a target's flank.
Enhanced Gibbet Potency: 560
Flank Enhanced Potency: 620
Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Gallows
Duration: 60s
The action Blood Stalk changes to Unveiled Gallows while under the effect of Enhanced Gallows.
Additional Effect: Increases Shroud Gauge by 10
Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Reaver.

actions.Name: Gallows
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 500.
560 when executed from a target's rear.
Enhanced Gallows Potency: 560
Rear Enhanced Potency: 620
Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Gibbet
Duration: 60s
The action Blood Stalk changes to Unveiled Gibbet while under the effect of Enhanced Gibbet.
Additional Effect: Increases Shroud Gauge by 10
Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Reaver.

actions.Name: Guillotine
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Increases Shroud Gauge by 10
Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Reaver.

actions.Name: Plentiful Harvest
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 720 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Immortal Sacrifice Cost: 1 stack
Potency increases up to 1,000 as stacks of Immortal Sacrifice exceed minimum cost.
Additional Effect: Grants Ideal Host
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants Perfectio Occulta
Perfectio Occulta Effect: Grants Perfectio Parata upon executing Communio
Duration: 30s
Cannot be executed while under the effect of Bloodsown Circle.
Consumes all stacks of Immortal Sacrifice upon execution.

actions.Name: Harpe
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 300.
Additional Effect: Increases Soul Gauge by 10

actions.Name: Soulsow
actions.Description:
Grants Soulsow to self, changing the action to Harvest Moon.
Cast time is instant when used outside of battle.

actions.Name: Blood Stalk
actions.Description:
Summons your avatar to deliver an attack with a potency of 340.
Additional Effect: Grants Soul Reaver
Duration: 30s
Stack count will be reduced to 1 when already under the effect of Soul Reaver.
Effect cannot be stacked with Executioner.
Soul Gauge Cost: 50
Shares a recast timer with all avatar attacks except Gluttony.

actions.Name: Grim Swathe
actions.Description:
Summons your avatar to deliver an attack with a potency of 140 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Grants Soul Reaver
Duration: 30s
Stack count will be reduced to 1 when already under the effect of Soul Reaver.
Effect cannot be stacked with Executioner.
Soul Gauge Cost: 50
Shares a recast timer with all avatar attacks except Gluttony.

actions.Name: Gluttony
actions.Description:
Summons your avatar to deal unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 520 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants 2 stacks of Executioner
Duration: 30s
Effect cannot be stacked with Soul Reaver.
Soul Gauge Cost: 50

actions.Name: Enshroud
actions.Description:
Offers your flesh as a vessel to your avatar, gaining maximum stacks of Lemure Shroud.
Duration: 30s
Certain actions cannot be executed while playing host to your avatar.
Additional Effect: Grants Oblatio
Duration: 30s
Shroud Gauge Cost: 50

actions.Name: Communio
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 1,100 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Perfectio Parata when executed while Perfectio Occulta is active
Duration: 30s
Enshrouded effect expires upon execution.
Requires at least one stack of Lemure Shroud to execute.

actions.Name: Hell's Ingress
actions.Description:
Quickly dash 15 yalms forward.
Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Harpe
Enhanced Harpe Effect: Next Harpe can be cast immediately and will reduce recast timer of Hell's Ingress by 5s upon execution
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Leaves behind a Hellsgate at point of origin, and grants Threshold to self
Duration: 10s
Cannot be executed while bound.
Shares a recast timer with Hell's Egress.

actions.Name: Hell's Egress
actions.Description:
Quickly dash 15 yalms backwards.
Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Harpe
Enhanced Harpe Effect: Next Harpe can be cast immediately and will reduce recast timer of Hell's Egress by 5s upon execution
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Leaves behind a Hellsgate at point of origin, and grants Threshold to self
Duration: 10s
Cannot be executed while bound.
Shares a recast timer with Hell's Ingress.

actions.Name: Arcane Crest
actions.Description:
Grants Crest of Time Borrowed to self, creating a barrier that nullifies damage totaling up to 10% of maximum HP.
Duration: 5s
Grants Crest of Time Returned to self and nearby party members within a radius of 15 yalms when barrier is completely absorbed.
Crest of Time Returned Effect: Gradually restores HP
Cure Potency: 50
Duration: 15s

actions.Name: Arcane Circle
actions.Description:
Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members by 3%.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Grants Circle of Sacrifice to self and nearby party members
Duration: 5s
Additional Effect: Grants Bloodsown Circle to self
Duration: 6s
Circle of Sacrifice Effect: When you or party members under this effect successfully land a weaponskill or ability, or cast a spell, the reaper who applied it may be granted a stack of Immortal Sacrifice, up to a maximum of 8
Duration: 30s
Bloodsown Circle Effect: Allows you to accumulate stacks of Immortal Sacrifice from party members under the effect of your Circle of Sacrifice

roleActions.Name: Second Wind
roleActions.Description:
Instantly restores own HP.
Cure Potency: 800

roleActions.Name: Bloodbath
roleActions.Description:
Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.
Duration: 20s

roleActions.Name: True North
roleActions.Description:
Nullifies all action direction requirements.
Duration: 10s
Maximum Charges: 2

roleActions.Name: Arm's Length
roleActions.Description:
Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: When you are struck by a physical attack, the striker will be afflicted with Slow +20%
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Feint
roleActions.Description:
Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.
Duration: 15s

actions.Name: Harvest Moon
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Potency increases up to 12,000 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 50% HP or less.
Additional Effect: Absorbs 50% of damage dealt as HP
Maximum Charges: 2
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Plentiful Harvest
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Potency increases up to 24,000 based on your accumulated stacks of Immortal Sacrifice, gained by executing Executioner's Guillotine, KOing enemies, or earning assists.
Consumes all stacks of Immortal Sacrifice upon execution.
Can only be executed while not under the effect of Enshrouded.
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Grim Swathe
actions.Description:
Summons your avatar to deliver an attack with a potency of 4,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Grants Executioner's Guillotine Ready
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Heavy +75%
Duration: 3s

※Infernal Slice Combo changes to Executioner's Guillotine upon execution.

actions.Name: Death Warrant
actions.Description:
Afflicts target with Death Warrant, causing you to compile damage you deal to that target. Action is changed to Fate Sealed for the duration of the effect.
Deals damage when time expires or upon executing Fate Sealed.
Duration: 8s
Damage Potency: 2,000 plus 50% of compiled damage

actions.Name: Hell's Ingress
actions.Description:
Quickly dash 15 yalms forward.
Additional Effect: Leaves behind a Hellsgate at point of origin, and grants Threshold to self
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Increases movement speed by 25%
Duration: 5s
Cannot be executed while bound.

※Action changes to Regress upon execution.

actions.Name: Arcane Crest
actions.Description:
Grants Crest of Time Borrowed to self, creating a barrier that nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 12,000 potency.
Duration: 10s
Grants the Crest of Time Returned to self and nearby party members within a radius of 15 yalms when barrier is completely absorbed.
Crest of Time Returned Effect: Gradually restores HP
Cure Potency: 6,000
Duration: 6s

actions.Name: Tenebrae Lemurum
actions.Description:
Offers your flesh as a vessel to your avatar, gaining 5 stacks of Enshrouded.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Afflicts nearby enemies with Hysteria
Hysteria Effect: Afflicted enemies are unable to act of their own free will
Duration: 2s
Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.
Gauge Charge Time: 60s
Has no effect on players riding machina or non-player combatants.

※Action changes to Communio while under the effect of Enshrouded.
※Grim Swathe changes to Lemure's Slice while under the effect of Enshrouded.
※Infernal Slice Combo changes to Void Reaping while under the effect of Enshrouded.

actions.Name: Slice
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Waxing Slice
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.
Combo Action: Slice

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Infernal Slice
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 7,000.
Combo Action: Waxing Slice

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Void Reaping
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 10,000.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded.
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Cross Reaping
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 10,000.
Combo Action: Void Reaping
Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded.
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Lemure's Slice
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Bind
Duration: 3s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Enshrouded.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Regress
actions.Description:
Move instantly to the Hellsgate left behind by you.
Cannot be executed while bound.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Communio
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 15,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Perfectio Parata
Duration: 15s
Requires at least one stack of Enshrouded.
Consumes all stacks of Enshrouded upon execution.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Action changes to Perfectio upon execution.

actions.Name: Executioner's Guillotine
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Immortal Sacrifice, up to a maximum of 8
Can only be executed while under the effect of Executioner's Guillotine.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Fate Sealed
actions.Description:
Ends the effect of Death Warrant, dealing damage to the target.
Damage Potency: 2,000 plus 50% of compiled damage
Can only be executed while under the effect of Death Warrant.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Perfectio
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 10,000 to target and all enemies nearby it, incapacitating foes whose HP is below 25%.
Effect cannot be applied to players riding machina or non-player combatants.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Perfectio Parata.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

roleActions.Name: Guard
roleActions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 90% and grants immunity to Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, and knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 5s
Movement speed is reduced by 50% for the duration of this effect.
Effect ends upon reuse, using another action, or when the effect duration expires.

roleActions.Name: Standard-issue Elixir
roleActions.Description:
Restores your HP and MP to maximum.
Casting will be interrupted when damage is taken.

roleActions.Name: Purify
roleActions.Description:
Removes Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Deep Freeze, and Miracle of Nature.
Additional Effect: Grants Resilience
Resilience Effect: Nullifies status afflictions that can be removed by Purify, as well as knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 3s
Can be used even when under the effect of certain status afflictions.

roleActions.Name: Sprint
roleActions.Description:
Increases movement speed by 50%.
Effect ends upon reuse or execution of another action.
